fall-asleep.title: Fall asleep easier: practical steps
fall-asleep.excerpt: Having trouble falling asleep? These steps often help.
body: Keep a fixed wake time, even on weekends. Rhythm strengthens sleep drive.
Wind down 30–60 minutes before bed (dim lights, screen-free).
Don’t lie awake for long. Get up after ~20 min and do something calm until sleepy.

screen-time.title: Screens in bed
screen-time.excerpt: Screen use near bedtime can delay sleep. Here’s how to reduce the impact.
body: Avoid intense screen use in the last hour before bed.
Use night mode/warmer light if you must use a screen.
Move entertainment out of the bed to strengthen the bed = sleep association.
